sentence: Rob Portman (R-Ohio) on Wednesday endorsed former Ohio Republican Party chair Jane Timken in the race to succeed him, calling Timken “the best candidate to advance conservative Republican policies to help Ohio workers and families.” Timken has touted herself in TV ads as a “Trump conservative” and is one of several Republican candidates who have worked furiously to prove their fealty to the former president.
title: Ohio’s Sen. Portman backs former state GOP chair Jane Timken in race to succeed him

sentence: “I believe Jane Timken is the best candidate to advance conservative Republican policies to help Ohio workers and families.
author: Talia Naquin
title: U.S. Senator Rob Portman endorses Jane Timken to fill his seat

sentence: The nod might go to a more establishment candidate, such as former state party chair Jane Timken, who has Portman’s endorsement.
title: Opinion J.D. Vance’s attack on Gen. Barry McCaffrey is obscene. It’s also not unusual for today’s GOP.

sentence: “Jane Timken is comfortable with establishment Republicans who make up a faction of our party, and with strong Trump Republicans who also are an important faction of our party, and that’s been true since becoming party chair,” he said.
title: Trump endorsement casts long shadow over Ohio Senate race

sentence: After Jane Timken gave a stump speech lambasting inflation, illegal immigration and the "indoctrination of our children," U.S. Sen.

title: With Portman endorsement, Ohio Senate candidate Jane Timken juggles opposing GOP factions

sentence: Candidates like Josh Mandel, Mike Gibbons, Jane Timken, and Vance have been battling it out in the primary.

title: Ohio Rallygoers Advised Not To Attend President Donald Trump Saturday Event Over JD Vance Endorsement?

sentence: La decisión del expresidente fue una estocada para otros candidatos en la contienda que estuvieron durante meses suplicando su apoyo, entre ellos, el extesorero estatal Josh Mandel, el banquero de inversiones Mike Gibbons y la expresidenta del Partido Republicano de Ohio, Jane Timken.
title: Donald Trump celebra mitin en Ohio en medio de críticas al respaldo de JD Vance para el Senado de EE. UU.
